Verses: 1 engal Aandavaraagiya Karththaave, Ummudaiya Naamam Boomiyengum Evvalavu Menmaiyulladhaayirukkiradhu! Ummudaiya Magaththuvaththai Vaanangalukku Melaaga Vaiththeer.
2 pagaignanaiyum Pazhikaaranaiyum Adakkippoda, Dhevareer Ummudaiya Saththurukkalinimiththam Kuzhandhaigal Paalagar Vaayinaal Belan Undupannineer.
3 umadhu Viralgalin Kiriyaiyaagiya Ummudaiya Vaanangalaiyum, Neer Sthaabiththa Sandhiranaiyum, Natchaththirangalaiyum Naan Paarkkumbodhu,
4 manushanai Neer Ninaikkiradharkum, Manushakumaaranai Neer Visaarikkiradharkum Avan Emmaaththiram Engiren.
5 neer Avanai Dhevathoodharilum Satru Siriyavanaakkineer; Magimaiyinaalum Ganaththinaalum Avanai Mudisoottineer.
6 ummudaiya Karaththin Kiriyaigalinmel Neer Avanukku Aalugai Thandhu, Sagalaththaiyum Avanudaiya Paadhangalukkuk Keezhppaduththineer.
8 aagaayaththup Paravaigalaiyum, Samuththiraththu Machchangalaiyum, Kadalgalil Sanjarikkiravaigalaiyum Avanudaiya Paadhangalukkuk Keezhppaduththineer.
9 engal Aandavaraagiya Karththaave, Ummudaiya Naamam Boomiyengum Evvalavu Menmaiyulladhaayirukkiradhu.
